items.question: Can I create my own custom templates?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can create custom templates from scratch or modify existing ones. Save any successful event as a template for future use.

items.question: Do templates include vendor and supplier recommendations?
items.answer: Yes, many templates include recommended vendor categories and evaluation criteria. Some include specific supplier recommendations based on location and event type.

items.question: Are templates updated with industry best practices?
items.answer: Yes, our template library is regularly updated by event professionals and incorporates the latest industry trends and best practices.

items.question: Can I share templates with my team or organization?
items.answer: Yes, templates can be shared within your organization and across team members. You can also control permissions for who can edit vs. use templates.

items.question: Do templates work for international events?
items.answer: Yes, our templates include considerations for international events including compliance requirements, cultural considerations, and time zone management.
